entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
